019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.vmconlet;
020
021import freemarker.core.ParseException;
022import freemarker.template.MalformedTemplateNameException;
023import freemarker.template.Template;
024import freemarker.template.TemplateNotFoundException;
025import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1Namespace;
026
027import java.io.IOException;
028import java.util.HashSet;
029import java.util.Map;
030import java.util.Optional;
031import java.util.Set;
032import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
033import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.events.VmChannel;
034import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.events.VmDefChanged;
035import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.events.VmDefChanged.Type;
036import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
037import org.jgrapes.core.Event;
038import org.jgrapes.core.Manager;
039import org.jgrapes.core.annotation.Handler;
040import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.Conlet.RenderMode;
041import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.ConletBaseModel;
042import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.ConsoleConnection;
043import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.AddConletRequest;
044import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.AddConletType;
045import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.AddPageResources.ScriptResource;
046import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.ConsoleReady;
047import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.RenderConlet;
048import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.RenderConletRequestBase;
049import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.SetLocale;
050import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.freemarker.FreeMarkerConlet;
051
052/**
053 */
054public class VmConlet extends FreeMarkerConlet<VmConlet.VmInfo> {
055
056    private static final Set<RenderMode> MODES = RenderMode.asSet(
057        RenderMode.Preview, RenderMode.View);
058    private Map<String, V1Namespace> vmInfos = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
059
060    /**
061     * Creates a new component with its channel set to the given channel.
062     * 
063     * @param componentChannel the channel that the component's handlers listen
064     * on by default and that {@link Manager#fire(Event, Channel...)}
065     * sends the event to
066     */
067    public VmConlet(Channel componentChannel) {
068        super(componentChannel);
069    }
070
071    /**
072     * On {@link ConsoleReady}, fire the {@link AddConletType}.
073     *
074     * @param event the event
075     * @param channel the channel
076     * @throws TemplateNotFoundException the template not found exception
077     * @throws MalformedTemplateNameException the malformed template name
078     *             exception
079     * @throws ParseException the parse exception
080     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
081     */
082    @Handler
083    public void onConsoleReady(ConsoleReady event, ConsoleConnection channel)
084            throws TemplateNotFoundException, MalformedTemplateNameException,
085            ParseException, IOException {
086        // Add conlet resources to page
087        channel.respond(new AddConletType(type())
088            .setDisplayNames(
089                localizations(channel.supportedLocales(), "conletName"))
090            .addRenderMode(RenderMode.Preview)
091            .addScript(new ScriptResource().setScriptType("module")
092                .setScriptUri(event.renderSupport().conletResource(
093                    type(), "VmConlet-functions.js")))
094//            .addCss(event.renderSupport(),
095//                WebConsoleUtils.uriFromPath("VmConlet-style.css"))
096        );
097    }
098
099    @Override
100    protected Optional<VmInfo> createNewState(AddConletRequest event,
101            ConsoleConnection connection, String conletId) throws Exception {
102        return Optional.of(new VmInfo(conletId));
103    }
104
105    @Override
106    protected Set<RenderMode> doRenderConlet(RenderConletRequestBase<?> event,
107            ConsoleConnection channel, String conletId, VmInfo conletState)
108            throws Exception {
109        Set<RenderMode> renderedAs = new HashSet<>();
110        if (event.renderAs().contains(RenderMode.Preview)) {
111            Template tpl
112                = freemarkerConfig().getTemplate("VmConlet-preview.ftl.html");
113            channel.respond(new RenderConlet(type(), conletId,
114                processTemplate(event, tpl,
115                    fmModel(event, channel, conletId, conletState)))
116                        .setRenderAs(
117                            RenderMode.Preview.addModifiers(event.renderAs()))
118                        .setSupportedModes(MODES));
119            renderedAs.add(RenderMode.View);
120        }
121        if (event.renderAs().contains(RenderMode.View)) {
122            Template tpl
123                = freemarkerConfig().getTemplate("VmConlet-view.ftl.html");
124            channel.respond(new RenderConlet(type(), conletId,
125                processTemplate(event, tpl,
126                    fmModel(event, channel, conletId, conletState)))
127                        .setRenderAs(
128                            RenderMode.View.addModifiers(event.renderAs()))
129                        .setSupportedModes(MODES));
130            renderedAs.add(RenderMode.View);
131        }
132        return renderedAs;
133    }
134
135    /**
136     * Track the VM definitions.
137     *
138     * @param event the event
139     * @param channel the channel
140     */
141    @Handler(namedChannels = "manager")
142    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.ConfusingTernary")
143    public void onVmDefChanged(VmDefChanged event, VmChannel channel) {
144        if (event.type() == Type.DELETED) {
145            vmInfos.remove(event.object().getMetadata().getName());
146        } else {
147            vmInfos.put(event.object().getMetadata().getName(), event.object());
148        }
149    }
150
151    @Override
152    protected boolean doSetLocale(SetLocale event, ConsoleConnection channel,
153            String conletId) throws Exception {
154        return true;
155    }
156
157    public class VmInfo extends ConletBaseModel {
158
159        public VmInfo(String conletId) {
160            super(conletId);
161        }
162
163    }
164}
